During TI9, If Team Secret manage to win the Champion, member eligible to 100% rebate loss bet that include Team Secret. Maximum rebate amount 888 CNY.
Final Tournament Result Champion
Bet Team Team Secret
Rebate 100%
Maximum Rebate Amount 888 CNY
Turnover Requirement 1X
  • 1

    If Team Secret Win TI9 Champion, any lose bet that include Team Secret will be reward as 100% full rebate, up to 888 CNY.

  • 2

    If Team Secret Win TI9 Champion, member must redeem the bonus within 24 hours, exceed time will be count as forfeit.

  • 3

    Reward bonus required 1X turnover to withdraw.

  • 4

    If found bonus seekers under same IP or under same affiliate, Any violation will result in their bonus or profit void.

  • 5

    If found to be professional punter or bonus seeker, UWIN reserves the rights to revoke all bonus and profit.

  • 6
